zh.0_exit: 请输入指令(输入exit关闭程序,输入menu查看功能菜单,输入amenu列出所有功能):
zh.0_menu_quit: 翻页命令:(退出功能菜单输quit)
zh.0_progress: 是否显示计算进度（1为是，2为否）
zh.0_save_history: 请选择是否保存操作历史(输入1为是，输入2为否）
zh.0_save_result: 您是否需要启用保存计算结果功能？（是按1，不是按2，按2将永久禁用计算结果保存）:
zh.0_confirm_save: 您是否要保存结果？（是按1，不是按2）:
zh.0_save_image: 您是否要保存当前图像（输入1为是，输入2为否）
zh.0_enable_image: 您是否要启用图像保存功能（输1启用，输2则永久禁用）
zh.0_graphics_error: 当前环境不支持图形,程序需重启
zh.0_version: 您当前正在使用的是{} by QU QI
zh.1_method: 普通方法输1，埃式筛法输2
zh.2_method: 输入1为逐次逼近法，输入2为牛顿迭代法
zh.3_method: 莱布尼茨级数法输1，几何法输2，蒙特卡洛法输3，拉马努金公式法输4
zh.5_mode: 1代表加法运算,2代表减法运算,3代表除法运算,4代表乘法运算
zh.5_divide_zero: 您输入的除数是0，0不能作为除数
zh.8_money: 请输入您需要找的钱数：（人民币）
zh.9_options: 输入1求平均值，输入2求加权平均值，输入3求方差，输入4求标准差，输入5求中位数，输入6求众数：
zh.9_data: 请输入数据（一次一个，输入完毕输f)
zh.9_weights: 请输入权重（一次一个，输入完毕输f)
zh.9_count_mismatch: 错误：数据和权重数量不同！
zh.9_enter_data: 依次输入数据，输入完毕输f
zh.10_points_count: 请输入取点数量（需为偶数）
zh.11_student: 请输入学生名,全部录入输f
zh.12_note: 注意：正切函数只能使用代数算法绘制！
zh.12_method: 输入1为几何算法，输入2为代数算法
zh.12_function: 正弦输入1，余弦输入2，正切输入3
zh.12_x_start: 设置图像X轴起点（正弦&正切推荐-300，余弦推荐-250）
zh.12_y_start: 设置图像Y轴起点（正弦&正切&代数法余弦推荐0，几何法余弦推荐-10000）
zh.12_scale: 输入几何法缩放系数（推荐10000）
zh.12_no_geometry: 几何算法无法绘制tan图像，请使用代数算法
zh.12_scale_alg: 请输入代数法缩放系数（推荐2）
zh.13_coeff: 依次输入每项的系数，从二次项到常数项(若不存在该项则输入0)，输入完毕输f
zh.15_mode: 1: 笛卡尔坐标至极坐标，2: 极坐标至笛卡尔坐标
zh.16_filename: 请输入您要查找的json文件的名称（例：查找file.json输入file)
zh.16_search: 请输入您需要查找的文本或数值：
zh.16_found_at: 找到啦,在{}.json中的索引位置为{}至{}
zh.17_expanding: 您提供的数字的质因数过大，正在拓展搜索范围，请稍等
zh.18_mode: 1为最大公因数（GCD），2为最小公倍数（LCM）
zh.18_start: 开始输入数字（输入完毕后输入f）:
zh.18_enter_number: 请输入一个正整数（或输入f结束）:
zh.18_invalid_input: 输入无效，请输入数字或输入f结束！
zh.18_min_numbers: 错误：至少需要两个数字！
zh.18_no_factor: 错误：数字 {} 无法分解质因数！
zh.21_note: 请输入需要求值的角度（弧度制下pi的系数的分数形式，例如360度请在分子输入2，分母输入1）
zh.21_terms: 请输入展开的项数（越大越精确）
zh.22_mode: 角度转弧度输1，弧度转角度输2
zh.22_rad_note: 请输入弧度制下pi的系数，如pi/2请在分子输1，分母输2
zh.25_mode: 三边计算输1,底-高计算输2
zh.25_side1: 请输入三角形的第一个边长
zh.25_side2: 请输入三角形的第二个边长
zh.25_side3: 请输入三角形的第三个边长
zh.25_base: 请输入三角形的底边长
zh.25_invalid_triangle: 您输入的边长数据不能构成三角形
zh.26_angle_num: 请输入分子(弧度制下pi的系数的分子，如180度输入2)
zh.26_angle_den: 请输入分母(弧度制下pi的系数的分母，如180度输入1)
zh.27_input: 请输入您要转换的十进制数
zh.28_title: 计算整数系数多项式的有理数解
zh.28_note: 本程序计算的是形如xxx=0的等式的解，且不适用于常数项为0的式子，如果常数项为0请自行降次直至获得非零常数项再利用本程序计算
zh.28_degree: 请输入待求解多项式的次数
zh.28_coeff: 依次输入每项的系数，从最高次项到常数项(若不存在该项则输入0)，输入完毕输f
zh.28_roots: 您所给出方程的所有有理数解为{}
zh.29_function_note: 请输入函数表达式，使用x作为变量(可包括常数和特定函数，输入cons可查看所有支持的科学常数，输入func可查看所有支持的函数)
zh.29_cons:
本程序支持以下科学常数，可在表达式中直接输入:
pi:圆周率，e:自然常数
zh.29_func:
本程序支持以下特定函数，可在表达式中直接输入:
math:python中的math库，可通过类似math.sin(x)的方式直接调用
sin:正弦函数,cos:余弦函数，tan:正切函数
exp:自然指数函数e^x
sqrt:平方根函数
log:自然对数函数ln(x),备注:log(x,<底数>)可以指定以任意数为底的对数函数
zh.30_element: 请依次输入方阵中的元素(从左往右):
zh.30_invalid_element: 输入错误，请输入有效的数字
zh.31_mode: 加法请输1，减法请输2，乘法请输3，转置请输4
zh.31_matrix_count: 请输入参与运算的矩阵的数量
zh.31_rows: 请输入所要计算矩阵的行数
zh.31_cols: 请输入所要计算矩阵的列数
zh.31_set_matrix: 现在开始设置第{}个矩阵:
zh.32_title: 常见数学模型计算(复利，半衰期，人口增长)
zh.32_mode: 输1代表复利计算，输2代表半衰期计算,输3代表人口增长模型
zh.32_rate: 请输入名义年利率(APR)，如0.05表示5%:
zh.32_compound: 请输入年复利次数(1为年复利，12为月复利):
zh.32_pop_mode: 请选择人口增长模型:(1代表指数增长模型，2代表逻辑增长模型)
zh.32_growth_rate: 请输入年增长率（小数形式，如0.02表示2%）:
zh.32_capacity: 请输入环境最大容纳量:
zh.33_mode: 1代表自然对数,2代表一般对数
zh.33_terms: 请输入展开项数(越大越精确)
zh.34_function_note: 请输入函数表达式，使用x作为变量(可包括常数和特定函数，输入cons可查看所有支持的科学常数，输入func可查看所有支持的函数)
zh.34_cons:
本程序支持以下科学常数，可在表达式中直接输入:
pi:圆周率，e:自然常数
zh.34_func:
本程序支持以下特定函数，可在表达式中直接输入:
math:python中的math库，可通过类似math.sin(x)的方式直接调用
sin:正弦函数,cos:余弦函数，tan:正切函数
exp:自然指数函数e^x
sqrt:平方根函数
log:自然对数函数ln(x),备注:log(x,<底数>)可以指定以任意数为底的对数函数
zh.34_enter_derivative_point: 请输入待求数值导数的函数在 x 轴上的求导位置:
zh.34_enter_accuracy: 请输入您所需要的精度（10的倍数，越小越结果精确）:
zh.benchmark_input1: 请输入您需要翻倍的数值
zh.benchmark_input2: 请输入您需要翻倍的次数
zh.benchmark_progress: 现在数值为{},这是第{}次翻倍.
zh.timer_not_supported: 当前环境暂不支持计时器功能

en.0_exit: Enter command (type 'exit' to quit, 'menu' for function menu, 'amenu' for all functions):
en.0_progress: Show calculation progress? (1 for yes, 2 for no)
en.0_save_history: Save operation history? (1 for yes, 2 for no)
en.0_save_result: Enable result saving? (1 for yes, 2 for no, 2 will permanently disable):
en.0_confirm_save: Save this result? (1 for yes, 2 for no):
en.0_save_image: Save current image? (1 for yes, 2 for no)
en.0_enable_image: Enable image saving? (1 for yes, 2 for no)
en.0_graphics_error: Graphics not supported in current environment, restart required
en.0_version: You are currently using {} by QU QI
en.1_method: 1 for normal method, 2 for sieve method
en.2_method: 1 for successive approximation, 2 for Newton's method
en.3_method: 1 for Leibniz series, 2 for geometric method, 3 for Monte Carlo, 4 for Ramanujan formula
en.5_mode: 1 for addition, 2 for subtraction, 3 for division, 4 for multiplication
en.5_divide_zero: You entered 0 as divisor, 0 cannot be divisor
en.9_options: 1 for average, 2 for weighted average, 3 for variance, 4 for standard deviation, 5 for median, 6 for mode:
en.9_data: Please enter data (one at a time, enter 'f' when finished)
en.9_weights: Please enter weights (one at a time, enter 'f' when finished)
en.9_count_mismatch: Error: data and weights count mismatch!
en.9_enter_data: Enter data one by one, enter 'f' when finished
en.10_mode: 1 for linear function, 2 for quadratic function
en.10_points_count: Please enter number of points (must be even)
en.11_student: Please enter student name, enter 'f' when finished
en.12_note: Note: tangent function can only be drawn using algebraic method!
en.12_method: 1 for geometric method, 2 for algebraic method
en.12_function: 1 for sine, 2 for cosine, 3 for tangent
en.12_x_start: Set graph X-axis starting point (recommended -300 for sine & tangent, -250 for cosine)
en.12_y_start: Set graph Y-axis starting point (recommended 0 for sine & tangent & algebraic cosine, -10000 for geometric cosine)
en.12_no_geometry: Geometric method cannot draw tan graph, please use algebraic method
en.12_scale_alg: Please enter algebraic method scaling factor (recommended 2)
en.13_coeff: Enter coefficients from quadratic term to constant term (enter 0 if term doesn't exist), enter 'f' when finished
en.15_mode: 1: Cartesian to polar, 2: Polar to Cartesian
en.16_filename: Please enter json filename to search (e.g., enter 'file' for file.json)
en.16_search: Please enter text or value to search:
en.17_no_factors: 0 and negative numbers have no prime factors
en.17_expanding: Your number has large prime factors, expanding search range, please wait
en.18_enter_number: Please enter a positive integer (or enter 'f' to end):
en.18_invalid_input: Invalid input, please enter number or 'f' to end!
en.18_min_numbers: Error: at least two numbers required!
en.20_mode: 1 for permutation nPr, 2 for combination nCr
en.20_r: Please enter positive integer r (r ≤ n):
en.21_note: Please enter angle as coefficient of pi in fraction form (e.g., for 360 degrees enter numerator 2, denominator 1)
en.21_function: 1 for sin, 2 for cos, 3 for tan
en.21_terms: Please enter number of expansion terms (more for higher accuracy)
en.22_mode: 1 for degrees to radians, 2 for radians to degrees
en.22_rad_note: Please enter coefficient of pi in fraction form (e.g., for pi/2 enter numerator 1, denominator 2)
en.25_invalid_triangle: Your side lengths cannot form a triangle
en.26_angle_num: Enter numerator (coefficient of pi numerator, e.g., 2 for 180 degrees)
en.26_angle_den: Enter denominator (coefficient of pi denominator, e.g., 1 for 180 degrees)
en.27_input: Please enter decimal number to convert
en.28_note: This program solves equations of form xxx=0 and is not suitable for equations with zero constant term. If constant term is zero, please reduce degree until you get non-zero constant term
en.28_coeff: Enter coefficients from highest degree to constant term (enter 0 if term doesn't exist), enter 'f' when finished
en.29_function_note: Please enter function expression using x as variable (can include constants and specific functions, enter 'cons' to view supported constants, 'func' to view supported functions)
en.29_cons:
Supported scientific constants (can be used directly in expressions):
pi: pi, e: natural constant
en.29_func:
Supported specific functions (can be used directly in expressions):
math: python math library, can be called like math.sin(x)
sin: sine function, cos: cosine function, tan: tangent function
exp: natural exponential function e^x
sqrt: square root function
log: natural logarithm ln(x), note: log(x,<base>) can specify logarithm with any base
en.29_positive_int: Number of intervals must be positive integer
en.30_element: Please enter matrix elements (left to right):
en.30_invalid_element: Input error, please enter valid number
en.31_mode: Enter 1 for addition, 2 for subtraction, 3 for multiplication, or 4 for transposition
en.31_matrix_count: Please enter number of matrices to operate
en.32_title: Mathematical models (compound interest, half-life, population growth)
en.32_mode: 1 for compound interest, 2 for half-life, 3 for population growth
en.32_rate: Please enter annual interest rate (APR), e.g., 0.05 for 5%:
en.32_compound: Please enter compounding frequency per year (1 for annual, 12 for monthly):
en.32_pop_mode: Please select population growth model:(1 for exponential growth, 2 for logistic growth)
en.32_growth_rate: Please enter annual growth rate (decimal, e.g., 0.02 for 2%):
en.33_mode: 1 for natural logarithm, 2 for general logarithm
en.33_terms: Please enter number of expansion terms (more for higher accuracy)
en.34_function_note: Please enter function expression using x as variable (can include constants and specific functions, enter 'cons' to view supported constants, 'func' to view supported functions)
en.34_cons:
Supported scientific constants (can be used directly in expressions):
pi: pi, e: natural constant
en.34_func:
Supported specific functions (can be used directly in expressions):
math: python math library, can be called like math.sin(x)
sin: sine function, cos: cosine function, tan: tangent function
exp: natural exponential function e^x
sqrt: square root function
log: natural logarithm ln(x), note: log(x,<base>) can specify logarithm with any base
en.34_enter_derivative_point: Please enter the differentiation point on the x-axis for the function whose numerical derivative is to be calculated:
en.34_enter_accuracy: Please enter the required precision (multiple of 10, smaller values yield more accurate results):
en.benchmark_progress: Current value is {}, this is doubling number {}
en.timer_minutes: {} minutes {} seconds, press 'a' to stop timer
en.timer_not_supported: Timer function not supported in current environment
